channel.title: Digital on Joshua Mauldin
channel.description: Recent content in Digital on Joshua Mauldin

item.title: Spirit Photography
item.description: Study of spirit photography, an early 1900s phenomenon, since debunked. Mixed media.

item.title: Holograph series
item.description: A series that revisited some older works and tried seeing them in a new light. Glitch - 1 of 54.mov Glitch - 2 of 54.mov Glitch - 3 of 54.mov

item.title: Burn series
item.description: A series focusing on pushing type legibility to the limits and repeating phrases like a mantra. GlitchArt_export (1).mov GlitchArt_export (2).mov GlitchArt_export (3).mov GlitchArt_export (4).mov GlitchArt_export (5).mov GlitchArt_export.mov

item.title: Collage000
item.description: Mixed media focusing on bees, New York city maps, transparency, and crime. Basis for artwork for a podcast called Elementary, My Dears.

item.title: Pandemic Series
item.description: What do you do when you’re stuck inside and the world crashing down around you? Make art. This isn’t happy stuff. Lyrics: Nine Inch Nails, “Head Like a Hole”

item.title: an endless echo
item.description: HYPERSPEKTIV.mov

item.title: Helvética Blanc Collab
item.description: I collaborated with Helvetica Blanc on a piece! I contributed the moody landscape.

item.title: i’m afraid of americans
item.description: Best Bowie song, and I will defend that position with my life.

item.title: is everything speeding up
item.description: lyrics: nine inch nails

item.title: It looks that way Series
item.description: Glitch - 12 of 54.mov

item.title: Little Fears Series
item.description: A series dedicated to automatic writing and textural experiments. Glitch - 46 of 54.mp4 Glitch - 47 of 54.mp4 Glitch - 48 of 54.mp4 Glitch - 51 of 54.mp4

item.title: Little Weirdos
item.description: I have no justification for any of this, except that it was weird and fun. HYPERSPEKTIV (1).mov Glitch - 52 of 54.mp4 Glitch - 50 of 54.mp4 Glitch - 49 of 54.mp4 Glitch - 53 of 54.mp4 digital- - 3.mov digital- - 2.mov digital- - 1.mov art - 2.mov

item.title: Memento Mori Series
item.description: A combination of something lively and organic with something … not lively.

item.title: Our Light
item.description: I find cults horrifying and fascinating. Sometimes I make art about them. If you’re trying to recruit me for yours, no thank you. Glitch - 11 of 54.mov

item.title: Processing.js series
item.description: Made with processing.js, among other things.

item.title: Softly we rush onward
item.description: Craft night exploration.

item.title: The Black Tape Series
item.description: Transparency paper, cutouts, tape, ruined scans. A whole lotta fun. Lyrics: Run the Jewels Lyrics: Brand New Lyrics: Radiohead Lyrics: Brand New Lyrics: He is Legend, “China White II” Lyrics: Powerman5000 Lyrics: The Dead Weather Lyrics: Nine Inch Nails

item.title: thoughts and prayers don’t stop bullets
item.description: I started remixing this every time I saw a school shooting on the news. I ran out of ideas pretty quickly. :-(

item.title: Video Series
item.description: Some video experiments I did with apps on my phone, weird TVs, and other found footage. item.title: Voids
item.description: Looking into a void.

item.title: When It’s Over Series
item.description: Made with processing.js, Photoshop, and other pixel ruiners.

item.title: Where Is Home

item.title: Cult of Done Poster
